name: astratrade-development
description: AstraTrade development environment with frontend and backend services

scripts.dev:fullstack: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run start"
scripts.serve:frontend: cd apps/astratrade-frontend && flutter build web && python -m http.server 8080 -d build/web
scripts.health:check: curl -s http://localhost:8000/health && curl -s http://localhost:9001 && curl -s http://localhost:3001/health
